_comments.cores: CPUs per task — preprocessing is mostly single-threaded, but extra cores help numpy/scipy
_comments.time: Per-patient wall time limit (D-HH:MM). Largest patients take ~60 min; 4h is safe
_comments.memory: RAM per task — largest sequences decompress to ~20 GB in pandas; 32G is safe
_comments.merge_time: Wall time for the merge/fold-organisation job (fast, ~5 min)
_comments.merge_memory: RAM for merge job — only loads small numpy windows, not raw parquets
_comments.account: Billing account (leave empty if not required)
